Text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Author: Steve Jobs

Text: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
Author: Babe Ruth

Text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
Author: Napoleon Hill

Text: Always do what you are afraid to do.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Text: Some mistakes take us to the right place.
Author: Buddha

Text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Author: George Eliot

Text: Change. But start slowly, because direction is more important than speed.
Author: Paulo Coelho

Text: The future depends on what we do in the present. Change doens't demand perfection, just a willingness to start, one day at a time.
Author: Sheldon Howe

Text: Small step sand smalls wins are necessary for building discipline and self-confidence.
Author: Sheldon Howe

Text: Self-discipline involves knowing yourself well enough to know when you need a break, say no, or rest and start again.
Author: Sheldon Howe

Text: Accept what is, let go of what was, and have faith in what will be.
Author: Sonia Ricotti

Text: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
Author: Hermann Hesse

Text: Those who keep learning will keep rising in life.
Author: Charlie Munger
